basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: Word of Lu Bu's skill spread far and wide, and he sparred with generals before the Emperor, but never once was he defeated. Impressed, the Emperor declared him unrivaled and ordered him to guard the canyon.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Grants an additional 40% Damage Boost each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Bloody Whirlwind
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 25% of Physical Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
 - 45% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 67% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 55%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 29% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Self, 1 Ally (Back Row First)
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: Grants 10% Defense Ignore Efficiency Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Crimson Gale's Advance
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 52% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 27% of Physical Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 32% of Physical Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 29% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Self, 1 Ally (Back Row First)
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: Grants 10% Defense Ignore Efficiency Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Superhuman Strength
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Attack hero(es) on your team grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Resets skill cooldowns upon gaining Revival. [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Reckless Valor [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Heaven Scorcher Halberd's Rage] upon either using a basic attack 2 time(s) or a skill 1 time(s). [Max 2 Stack(s)] (If deployed to a team with 3 or more Attack heroes)
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack 1 time(s) upon either using a basic attack 2 time(s) or a skill 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Blessing cap becomes 25% of Max HP.
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Diaochan, meat dumplings, liquor, military force, boisterousness, Crimson Gale, Diaochan's music, sleep, arm wrestling
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, vegetables, pettiness, being interrupted

basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: When Lu Bu learned that the officials he had once served and protected were oppressing the people and committing atrocities, he was enraged and took justice into his own hands.

 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: An orphan with no family to call his own, Lu Bu grew up stealing and fighting on the streets. One day, he caught the eye of a local official and was taken in, eventually rising as a soldier.
